name: MikeontheTrail
0:
”Alexa, Where is Mike?”
”Alexa, open Where is Mike.”
”Alexa, ask Where is Mike.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: where is mike
des: Mike on the Trail will provide to you the most recent trail update as he travels the Pacific Crest Trail from Mexico to Canada (just like he did on the Appalachian Trail in 2018). It will give his most recent mileage and journal entry of activities. It's your easiest way to stay up-to-date with your local adventurer! Subscribe to his YouTube channel: http://bit.ly/NavsterHikesYouTube
